entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 in a few localities early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
